column4: Does anybody know a possible cause of the error? gpg: symbol lookup error: /usr/local/lib/libreadline.so.6: undefined symbol: PC
yes you are missing that library
how can i install it?
try installing the package libreadline6 let me know if that fixed it
could it be that you are on a 64bit system you are trying to run a 32 bit app?
is libreadline5 installed too?
sudo apt-get install libreadline5 returns http://pastebay.com/101646
sudo apt-get install libreadline5 yields http://pastebay.com/101646
got it, looks like there is something misssing in ubuntus version of readling
some guy here had the same problem, he said manually building readline fixes it
thats the strange thing... thats how i installed it in the first place
did you reboot since then?
i will do that now.... i will be back in 4 minutes
i still have the same issue after restarting
okay, at this point I'm just guessing really, but for some people sudo apt-get install ubuntu-keyring  seemed to have fixed a similar problem
same strange error...
I'm sorry you could try asking for help via launchpad answerss
do you know how to fix [Install these packages without verification [y/N]?] it apears on all packages ever from regular repositories?
it says gpgv cannot be executed... may be related to the other error?
I'm sorry i do not know and I have to go now, I really hope that somebody else can help you
thanks for your help
you're welcome
